text: 47 is a year in the 1st century. It was a common year starting on Sunday of the Julian calendar. At the time, it was known as the Year of the Consulship of Caesar and Vitellius. == Events == * Gnaeus Domitius Corbulo is made commander of the Roman army in Germania Inferior. He conquers the Chauci. * Publius Ostorius Scapula becomes governor of Britain, in place of Aulus Plautius. * Musselburgh is founded in Roman Britain * A canal is built between the Rhine and Meuse in the Netherlands == Births == * == Deaths == * Vardanes I of Parthia Category:40s
